definition: Participate in sports.
example: I do sport three times a week.

definition: Time when one is not working or occupied; leisure time.
example: In my free time, I go to dance lessons.

definition: Leave one's home to go to a social event.
example: We only go out at weekends.

definition: Visit a sandy or pebbly shore by the sea.
example: We often go to the beach in the summer.

definition: Get together with friends socially.
example: I meet friends at a café after school.

definition: Engage in games played on a computer.
example: Many people play computer games in their free time.

definition: Participate in the sport of tennis.
example: They sometimes play tennis after work.

definition: Perform music on a piano.
example: I play the piano, but I’m not very good at it.

definition: Make or become less tense or anxious.
example: How do you relax before a match?

definition: Remain in the same place.
example: I like to stay at home on Sundays and read a book.

definition: Propel the body through water by using the limbs.
example: I don’t like the gym, so I swim for exercise.

definition: Make a journey, typically of some length.
example: I usually travel to work by bus.

definition: Move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at once.
example: I walk in the mountains near my town.

definition: The first month of the year.
example: My birthday is in January.

definition: The second month of the year.
example: February sometimes has 29 days.

definition: The third month of the year.
example: Jenny arrives in London in March.

definition: The fourth month of the year.
example: My girlfriend’s birthday is in April.

definition: The fifth month of the year.
example: We always have a party on the first of May.

definition: The sixth month of the year.
example: Summer begins in June.

definition: The seventh month of the year.
example: The US has a holiday on the fourth of July.

definition: The eighth month of the year.
example: Do your classes start in August?

definition: The ninth month of the year.
example: September is the ninth month of the year.

definition: The tenth month of the year.
example: Hallowe’en is on the last day of October.

definition: The eleventh month of the year.
example: Thanksgiving Day in the US is in November.

definition: The twelfth month of the year.
example: Christmas Day is in December.

definition: Constituting number one in a sequence; preceding all others.
example: My birthday is on the first of May.

definition: Constituting number two in a sequence; next after the first.
example: The second day of this month is a Monday.

definition: Constituting number three in a sequence; next after the second.
example: When is your birthday? ~ The third of August.

definition: Constituting number four in a sequence.
example: April is the fourth month of the year.

definition: Constituting number five in a sequence.
example: Today is the fifth day of the month.

definition: Constituting number six in a sequence.
example: The sixth letter of the alphabet is F.

definition: Constituting number seven in a sequence.
example: I’m in London on the seventh of August.

definition: Constituting number eight in a sequence.
example: His birthday is on the eighth of October.

definition: Constituting number nine in a sequence.
example: September is the ninth month of the year.

definition: Constituting number ten in a sequence.
example: What’s the date tomorrow? ~ The tenth of April.

definition: Constituting number eleven in a sequence.
example: The eleventh of September is a special day for me.

definition: Constituting number twelve in a sequence.
example: The twelfth of October is a national holiday in Spain.

definition: Constituting number thirteen in a sequence.
example: I’m on holiday on the thirteenth of March.

definition: Constituting number fourteen in a sequence.
example: See you on the fourteenth for dinner.

definition: Constituting number fifteen in a sequence.
example: Is today the fifteenth? ~ No, it’s the fourteenth.

definition: Constituting number sixteen in a sequence.
example: My birthday is on the sixteenth of September.

definition: Constituting number seventeen in a sequence.
example: My trip starts on the seventeeth of July.

definition: Constituting number eighteen in a sequence.
example: The eighteenth is on a Sunday this month.

definition: Constituting number nineteen in a sequence.
example: My parents’ anniversary is on the nineteenth of November.

definition: Constituting number twenty in a sequence.
example: Easter is on the twentieth of April this year.

definition: Constituting number twenty-one in a sequence.
example: The twenty-first of June is the last day of spring.

definition: Constituting number twenty-two in a sequence.
example: What day is the twenty-second of March?

definition: Constituting number twenty-three in a sequence.
example: His birthday is the twenty-third of April.

definition: Constituting number twenty-four in a sequence.
example: Is your birthday on the twenty-fourth?

definition: Constituting number twenty-five in a sequence.
example: My holiday starts on the twenty-fifth of August.

definition: Constituting number twenty-six in a sequence.
example: Z is the twenty-sixth letter of the alphabet.

definition: Constituting number twenty-seven in a sequence.
example: Is the twenty-seventh of June a Wednesday?

definition: Constituting number twenty-eight in a sequence.
example: What date is Thursday? ~ It's the twenty-eighth of September.

definition: Constituting number twenty-nine in a sequence.
example: It's the twenty-ninth of February tomorrow.

definition: Constituting number thirty in a sequence.
example: The thirtieth is the last day of this month.

definition: Constituting number thirty-one in a sequence.
example: The thirty-first of December is New Year’s Eve.

definition: A film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.
example: My favourite kind of film is an action film.

definition: A film made using animation techniques.
example: Pixar and Disney have made many famous animations.

definition: A film, play, or broadcast programme intended to make an audience laugh.
example: What kind of film is it? ~ It’s a comedy.

definition: A play for theatre, radio, or television; a film dealing with serious subjects.
example: I don’t know the actor in this drama.

definition: A film genre seeking to elicit a negative emotional reaction from viewers by playing on their fears.
example: I don’t like horror films!

definition: A film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.
example: I like the science-fiction film Alien.

definition: A film genre set primarily in the latter half of the 19th century in the American Old West.
example: Do you like westerns?

definition: The date April 1st.
example: Their birthday is the first of April.

definition: The date May 4th.
example: It's Friday the fourth of May.

definition: The date June 2nd.
example: Tomorrow is the second of June.

definition: The date July 20th.
example: Our holiday starts on the twentieth of July.

definition: The date March 23rd.
example: What's the date today? ~ It's the twenty-third of March.

definition: Used to ask someone if they are certain about something.
example: It’s her birthday next week. ~ Are you sure?

word: Call me on Monday at work.
definition: A request to be telephoned at one's workplace on Monday.
example: Can you call me on Monday at work, please?

definition: An expression of good wishes on someone's birthday.
example: Happy birthday! ~ Thank you!

definition: Asking for confirmation about the date being the first.
example: What's the date today? ~ Isn't it the first?

definition: Used to ask for identification of a person, often over the phone.
example: Is that Thomas? ~ Yes, this is Thomas.

definition: Stating that it is one's father's birthday.
example: It's my dad's birthday! He's 56 today.

definition: Used to give emphatic assent or agreement.
example: Are you sure it’s his birthday today? ~ Of course!

definition: Expressing an intention to speak with someone on Tuesday.
example: Talk to you on Tuesday. ~ Yes, thanks.

definition: Said when giving a gift to someone.
example: Happy birthday! This is for you. ~ Thank you!

word: We need to talk about your trip to London.
definition: Stating the necessity of discussing a trip to London.
example: We need to talk about your trip to London. When do you go?

definition: Asking for the current calendar date.
example: What's the date today? ~ It's the twenty-third.

definition: Confirming one's identity and asking for the caller's identity.
example: Is that Anna? ~ Yes. Who's that?

definition: In or to one's own dwelling or place of residence.
example: Where is Lisa? ~ She's at home.

definition: Without doubt (used for emphasis).
example: Is her birthday tomorrow? ~ No, it's definitely today.

definition: Perform the identical action or have the same occupation.
example: Do you do the same thing as your parents?

definition: Not including; other than.
example: I watch all sports except tennis. I don't like tennis.

definition: Causing great enthusiasm and eagerness.
example: Is it a good film? ~ Yes, it's exciting.

definition: An enthusiast of the sport of football.
example: Lots of football fans are going to watch the match.

definition: Enjoyable or amusing.
example: I play football every weekend. It's fun.

definition: Used to say that the answer to a question varies according to circumstances.
example: Do you like sport? ~ It depends on the sport. I like football.

definition: Approximately; almost.
example: It is finished? ~ More or less. It finishes in five minutes.

definition: By a specified amount in or for every hundred.
example: My exam score is 88 per cent!

definition: An establishment for the sale of beer and other drinks, and sometimes also food, to be consumed on the premises.
example: We can go to the pub after work.

definition: A large self-service shop selling groceries and household goods.
example: Please go to the supermarket and buy milk and bread.

definition: A person whose profession is acting on the stage, in films, or on television.
example: Samuel L Jackson is an American actor.

definition: An instruction to make no noise.
example: Be quiet. I can't hear the film.

definition: An instruction or plea not to shed tears.
example: Don't cry. They're acting!

definition: An instruction to remain still.
example: Don't move and be very quiet!

definition: An instruction to remain silent.
example: Don't say anything. I don't want to listen to you.

definition: A person who directs the making of a film.
example: James Cameron is a famous film director.

definition: Stating that one cannot recall something.
example: What happens next? ~ I don't remember.

definition: Touch or caress with the lips as a sign of love, sexual desire, or greeting.
example: This is the scene where they kiss.

definition: At the side of; beside.
example: I'm next to my sister in the photo.

definition: Not anything; no single thing.
example: Is there anything there? ~ No, nothing. It's empty.

definition: A sequence of continuous action in a play, film, opera, or book.
example: I like this scene. I think the actors are fantastic.

definition: Used to ask for more information about a topic just mentioned.
example: I was talking to my brother. ~ What about?

definition: The activity of purchasing garments.
example: I like going to the shops and buying clothes.

definition: The activity of spending a holiday living in a tent.
example: We go camping every summer.

definition: The practice or skill of preparing food by combining, mixing, and heating ingredients.
example: I like doing the cooking for my family.

definition: The sport or activity of riding a bicycle.
example: I like going cycling on good days.

definition: The practice of yoga.
example: I love doing yoga.

definition: Having a meal in a restaurant rather than at home.
example: I like eating out in restaurants with my friends.

definition: The action of flying through the air.
example: I hate flying. I don't like planes.

definition: Taking a walk, typically for leisure or exercise.
example: I am going for a walk at the weekend.

definition: Visiting a cinema to watch a film.
example: I like going to the cinema. I love action films!

definition: The process or art of using paint, in a picture, as a protective coating, or as decoration.
example: Do you like painting?

definition: The action or skill of reading written or printed matter silently or aloud.
example: I love reading. I read seven or eight books a month.

definition: The action or movement of a runner.
example: I like running in the park in the morning.

definition: The activity of buying goods from shops.
example: Do you like shopping for clothes?

definition: The activity of making musical sounds with the voice.
example: I love singing!

definition: The state of being asleep.
example: I like sleeping. I am very tired.

definition: The sport or activity of propelling oneself through water using the limbs.
example: Do you want to go swimming? We can go to the beach.

definition: The action of making a journey.
example: I love travelling. I want to go to China next.

definition: The activity of viewing television programmes that have a continuing story.
example: I like watching TV series.

definition: Purchase coffee.
example: Can we buy coffee here?

definition: Exchange one currency for another.
example: You can change money at the airport.

definition: Operate a vehicle at high speed.
example: You can't drive fast by a school.

definition: Bring (a vehicle that one is driving) to a halt and leave it temporarily, typically in a car park or by the side of the road.
example: Here's a car park. You can park here.

definition: Make a payment using a credit card.
example: Can I pay by credit card?

definition: Participate in the sport of football.
example: You can play football today.

definition: Capture images using a camera.
example: You can't take photos in the musuem.

definition: Access and utilize the global computer network.
example: You can use the internet here. We have wi-fi.

definition: Operate one's mobile telephone.
example: You can't use your mobile phone now.

definition: A person who teaches people how to drive a motor vehicle.
example: I have a good driving instructor. He is very patient.

definition: An official document authorizing an individual to drive a motor vehicle.
example: Do you have a driving licence?

definition: Be unsuccessful in achieving one's goal, especially in an examination.
example: I am nervous that I will fail the test.

definition: Stating availability on Monday.
example: Can I see you soon? ~ Yes, I'm free on Monday.

definition: Acquire the skill of operating a motor vehicle.
example: When do you learn to drive? We can learn at 17.

definition: Easily agitated or alarmed; tending to be anxious; highly strung.
example: I have test tomorrow and I'm nervous!

definition: Go past or across; leave behind or on one side in proceeding.
example: I want to pass my test.

definition: An examination of someone's ability to do something, rather than their knowledge of it.
example: You do the theory test first and then the practical test.

definition: Initiate the engine of a car.
example: OK, we are ready. Please start the car.

definition: Undergo an examination.
example: Do you have to take a test to get a licence?

definition: An examination of someone's knowledge of the theoretical aspects of a subject.
example: There are two tests: a theory test and a practical test.

definition: An event that is completely unsuccessful or catastrophic.
example: My test was a total disaster!

definition: Emphatic agreement or affirmation.
example: Can I see you on Monday at 6.30? ~ Yes, of course.

definition: Having no one else present; on one's own.
example: Are you alone in the house? ~ No, my brother is here.

definition: During social gatherings.
example: Do you like to dance at parties?

definition: Focus all one's attention on a particular object or activity.
example: Please be quiet! I can't concentrate.

definition: Afraid or anxious.
example: I feel frightened when I go through the park at night.

definition: Causing or likely to cause horror; shocking.
example: What's that horrible noise? It's very loud!

definition: Free from disturbance; tranquil.
example: This is a peaceful place. It's so quiet.

definition: At a high volume.
example: They play their music very loudly.

definition: Reach a place at the end of a journey or a stage in a journey.
example: What time does your flight arrive?

definition: Reserve (accommodation, a place, etc.); buy (a ticket) in advance.
example: Most people book tickets on the internet.

definition: Obtain (gifts) in exchange for payment.
example: When I travel, I always buy presents for my family.

definition: Support and move (a suitcase) from one place to another.
example: Travelling is easier with a small bag. I hate to carry a suitcase everywhere.

word: get a taxi (a train, a bus)
definition: Use a taxi (or train, or bus) for transport.
example: Get a taxi from the airport and come to my house.

definition: Go out of one's home.
example: They leave the house at seven every morning.

definition: Fill a suitcase with clothes and other items needed for a journey.
example: I need to pack my suitcase because I’m going on holiday.

definition: Telephone one's home.
example: Please phone home when you arrive at the hotel.

definition: Pay someone for the use of (a car), typically on a short-term basis.
example: It’s a good idea to rent a car because the public transport isn’t very good.

definition: Lodge at a hotel.
example: I don’t often stay in a hotel. I prefer to stay with friends.

definition: Stay in one place expecting a flight.
example: I usually read a book while I wait for a flight.

definition: Have (sunglasses) on one's body as clothing or an accessory.
example: I will wear sunglasses today because it is very hot.

definition: A soft, flat hat with a peak.
example: I like your cap. ~ Thanks, it says 'Oxford'.

definition: A one-piece garment for a woman or girl that has a bodice and a skirt and covers the upper part of the body.
example: She is wearing a dress to the party.

definition: A shaped covering for the head worn for warmth, as a fashion accessory, or as part of a uniform.
example: I wear a hat and sunglasses at the beach.

definition: An outer garment extending either to the waist or the hips, typically having sleeves and a fastening down the front.
example: I always wear a jacket here because I'm cold.

definition: Hard-wearing trousers made of denim or other cotton fabric, for informal wear.
example: Today he is wearing jeans and a T-shirt.

definition: A garment for the upper body made of cotton or a similar fabric, with a collar and sleeves, and buttons down the front.
example: I like your shirt. ~ Thanks, it’s new.

definition: A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
example: Do you wear trainers at work? ~ No, I wear shoes.

definition: A woman's outer garment fastened around the waist and hanging down around the legs.
example: She is wearing a red skirt and white T-shirt.

definition: A garment for the foot and lower part of the leg, typically knitted from wool, cotton, or nylon.
example: Are these your socks?

definition: A set of outer clothes made of the same fabric and designed to be worn together, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers or a jacket and skirt.
example: I have to wear a suit at work.

definition: A knitted garment typically with long sleeves, worn over the upper body.
example: Can I have your sweater, please? I'm cold.

definition: Soft shoes worn for sports or casual occasions.
example: I wear trainers to go running.

definition: An outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.
example: The waiters wear black trousers and white shirts.

definition: A short-sleeved casual top, generally made of cotton, having the shape of a T when spread out flat.
example: It's hot. Wear a T-shirt today.

definition: A polite way of saying 'I want'.
example: I'd like a coffee and a cheese sandwich, please.

definition: A polite refusal of an offer.
example: Would you like a drink? ~ No, thanks.

definition: A polite way of declining an invitation or request, indicating inability.
example: Would you like to play football? ~ Sorry, I can't. I'm busy.

definition: A polite way to make an invitation or offer an activity.
example: Would you like to go running?

definition: A polite way to offer something.
example: Would you like a coffee?

definition: An enthusiastic positive response to an invitation.
example: Would you like to go to the beach? ~ Yes, I'd love to.

definition: A polite affirmative response to an offer.
example: Would you like a coffee? ~ Yes, please.

definition: A suggestion to have coffee.
example: How about a coffee? ~ Yes, please.

word: I don't think it's a good idea.
definition: Expressing disapproval or doubt about a suggestion.
example: I don't think it's a good idea, sorry.

word: I'd like to ask you something.
definition: A polite way to preface a question or request.
example: I'd like to ask you something. ~ Yes, what is it?

word: Let's meet at half past three.
definition: A suggestion to meet at 3:30.
example: Let's meet at half past three by the entrance.

definition: Confirming an arrangement to meet at a specified location.
example: See you there. ~ Yes, see you there!

definition: A polite offer of a burger.
example: Would you like a burger? ~ Yes, good idea, thanks.

word: Would you like to come to the match with me?
definition: An invitation to attend a sports match together.
example: Would you like to come to the match with me on Saturday?

definition: An informal and enthusiastic acceptance of an invitation.
example: Yeah, I'd love to. When does it start?

definition: Asking for confirmation or certainty.
example: I think this is our bus. ~ Are you sure? We usually get the 4X.

definition: The place at a theatre, cinema, etc. where tickets are sold.
example: You can buy tickets at the box office.

definition: A designated place where buses stop for passengers to board or alight.
example: This is your bus stop. The number 12 stops here.

definition: An affectionate form of address to a beloved person.
example: Hello Mum! ~ Hello darling.

definition: A period of thirty minutes.
example: When do you want to meet? ~ In half an hour.

definition: A polite parting expression wishing someone a pleasant day.
example: Have a good day! ~ Thanks! See you tomorrow.

definition: Perceive with the ear the sound made by (someone or something).
example: I can hear my phone but I can't see it.

definition: A room in a house for general everyday use.
example: There is a TV and a sofa in the living room.

definition: A sound, especially one that is loud or unpleasant or that causes disturbance.
example: What's that noise? Is it your phone?

definition: Situated or moving beyond the confines or boundaries of.
example: Let's eat lunch outside. It's a beautiful day.

definition: Expressing an intention to meet someone after twenty minutes.
example: See you soon? ~ Yes, see you in 20 minutes.

definition: In the direction of.
example: Take the bus towards the city centre.

definition: A person who is in charge of a worker, group, or organization.
example: My boss says that we have to work hard today.

definition: Having been fractured or damaged and no longer in one piece or in working order.
example: The TV is broken. Can you repair it, please?

definition: Make a room free from dirt, marks, or mess.
example: How long does it take you to clean a room?

definition: Alter or modify something.
example: My boss wants to make changes at the company.

definition: Form friendships with people.
example: Do you make friends with people at work?

definition: Restore something damaged, faulty, or worn to a good condition.
example: Can you help me repair something, please?

definition: Provide breakfast for customers or guests.
example: The hotel serves breakfast between 6.30 a.m. and 9 a.m.

definition: Feeling or showing surprise.
example: We were surprised that our boss helped us to clean the rooms.

definition: Clean plates, cutlery, and cooking utensils after use.
example: Can you wash the dishes after dinner?

definition: Practical experience of a particular job acquired over a period of time.
example: I got work experience by working at a hotel for two weeks.

definition: Put a lot of effort into one's work.
example: You must work hard. We are very busy today.

definition: A counter or room where alcoholic drinks are served.
example: There’s a good bar and restaurant in this hotel.

definition: A large container for water, used for immersing and washing the body.
example: He always relaxes in the bath after work.

definition: A room containing a bath or shower and typically a washbasin and toilet.
example: My bathroom has a bath and a shower.

definition: A piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress.
example: The bed in the hotel room is very comfortable.

definition: An area or building where cars or other vehicles may be left temporarily.
example: The car park is behind the hotel.

definition: A recess or piece of furniture with a door and usually shelves, used for storage.
example: The towels are in this cupboard.

definition: A particular level of a building.
example: My hotel room is on the fifth floor.

definition: A shop that sells items suitable for giving as presents.
example: He bought a small present for his wife in the gift shop.

definition: A gymnasium or fitness centre.
example: I always stay in a hotel with a gym.

definition: Indicating the level of a building where something is located.
example: Where is your room? ~ It’s on the fifth floor.

definition: A device for giving light, either electric or powered by burning oil or gas.
example: There is a lamp next to the bed.

definition: A platform or compartment housed in a shaft for raising and lowering people or things to different levels.
example: There isn’t a lift in this hotel. ~ But my room is on the tenth floor!

definition: The natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible; a source of illumination.
example: It’s dark in here! Where’s the light?

definition: A rectangular cloth bag stuffed with soft material, used to support the head when lying or sleeping.
example: Can I have an extra pillow for my bed, please?

definition: The area in a hotel or office where visitors arrive and first encounter staff.
example: If you have a problem, please call the hotel reception.

definition: A device for controlling a machine or apparatus from a distance by means of signals transmitted from it.
example: I can’t find the remote control for the TV.

definition: A place where people pay to sit and eat meals that are cooked and served on the premises.
example: We can eat in the restaurant.

definition: A cubicle or bath in which a person stands under a spray of water to wash.
example: Hello, Reception? Can you help me? My shower is very cold.

definition: A commercial establishment offering health and beauty treatment through such means as steam baths, exercise equipment, and massage.
example: There’s a sauna in the spa.

definition: An artificial pool for swimming in.
example: This hotel has a swimming pool.

definition: A room or building containing a toilet or toilets.
example: Excuse me, where are the toilets? ~ They’re next to the bar.

definition: A piece of absorbent cloth or paper used for drying oneself or wiping things dry.
example: There is a clean towel in the bathroom.

definition: Asking for the location of something or someone.
example: Where is the swimming pool? ~ It’s next to the hotel.

definition: Expressing location or arrival in a particular place or position.
example: I am at school.

definition: Expressing the situation of something that is or appears to be enclosed or surrounded by something else.
example: The towels are in the bathroom.

definition: Physically in contact with and supported by (a surface).
example: The remote control is on the table.

definition: A place where drinks, especially alcoholic drinks, are sold and drunk, or the counter over which they are served.
example: Does the hotel have a bar?

definition: A journey made by boat, especially for pleasure.
example: Let's take a boat trip on the lake.

definition: A large building, typically of the medieval period, fortified against attack with thick walls, battlements, towers, and in many cases a moat.
example: There is a 15th-century castle near here.

definition: The part of the land adjoining or near the sea.
example: We live on the coast, near to the sea.

definition: A journey or excursion completed in one day.
example: Can we take a day trip to the island?

definition: A polite wish for someone to have a pleasant time while lodging somewhere.
example: Here are your keys. Enjoy your stay!

definition: An excellent sight or prospect, typically of attractive natural scenery.
example: This room has a great view of the lake.

definition: A piece of land surrounded by water.
example: You have to take a boat to get to the island.

definition: A large body of water surrounded by land.
example: There are a lot of fish in the lake.

definition: An imaginary creature that is typically large, ugly, and frightening.
example: The Loch Ness monster is famous!

definition: Located on the level of a building that is two storeys above ground level.
example: Your room is on the second floor.

definition: Accommodation available for the current night.
example: Can we have a room for tonight?

definition: A place that many tourists visit.
example: This island is a popular tourist destination.

definition: A person visiting a place or person, especially socially or as a tourist.
example: It costs £5 for visitors to go the castle.

definition: A financial establishment that invests money deposited by customers, pays it out when required, makes loans at interest, and exchanges currency.
example: Somebody robbed the bank last night.

definition: A structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.
example: How old is this building?

definition: A person, especially a police officer, whose occupation is investigating and solving crimes.
example: The detective asked a lot of questions.

definition: On the evening of the immediately preceding Friday.
example: I was at a party with my friends last Friday night.

definition: The evening or night immediately preceding today.
example: I stayed at home last night.

definition: A mechanism for keeping a door, lid, etc., fastened, typically operated by a key.
example: The door has a strong lock.

definition: A hotel that provides expensive and high-quality facilities and services.
example: We stayed at a luxury hotel on holiday. It was fantastic.

definition: The action of robbing a person or place.
example: There was a bank robbery last night.

definition: Something that is kept or meant to be kept unknown or unseen by others.
example: Can I tell you a secret? Don't tell anyone else!

definition: Rooms where things are stored.
example: There are store rooms underground.

definition: Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.
example: The bank has very strong walls.

definition: A person thought to be guilty of a crime or offence.
example: The police are talking to the suspect.

definition: The period from 1401 to 1500.
example: They built the castle in the 15th century.

definition: With or in proximity to another person or people.
example: I don't want to go on my own. Let's go together.

definition: The day before today.
example: Where were you yesterday?

definition: The afternoon of the day before today.
example: I went to the shops yesterday afternoon.

definition: At, into, or across the space separating (two objects or regions).
example: The restaurant is between the gym and the cinema.

word: Excuse me. Is there a…near here?
definition: A polite way to ask for directions to a nearby place.
example: Excuse me. Is there a bank near here?

definition: Continue in the same direction without turning.
example: Turn left and then go straight on.

definition: Located at the point where two streets meet.
example: The coffee shop is on the corner.

definition: Situated on the left-hand side.
example: Your hotel is on the left.

definition: Situated on the right-hand side.
example: The park is on the right.

definition: In a position on the other side of a specific area from; facing.
example: The car park is opposite the bank.

definition: Change direction to the left.
example: Turn left at the Italian restaurant.

definition: Change direction to the right.
example: Walk out of the train station and turn right.

word: Excuse me, this cash machine isn't working.
definition: Politely informing someone that an ATM is out of order.
example: Excuse me. This cash machine isn't working. ~ There is a cash machine by the bank.

definition: An expression of surprise or disbelief.
example: I don't believe it! All the car parks are full.

word: Is there a cash machine near here?
definition: Asking for the location of a nearby ATM.
example: Excuse me. Is there a cash machine near here?

definition: Estimating a duration of approximately 15 minutes.
example: Is your house near here? ~ It only takes about 15 minutes to walk there.

definition: A polite and emphatic expression of gratitude.
example: The cinema is on London Street. ~ Thanks very much.

word: Turn left when you leave the station.
definition: Giving directions to turn left after exiting the station.
example: Turn left when you leave the station. ~ Thanks!

definition: In or to a foreign country or countries.
example: Do you want to go abroad or stay in the UK for your holiday?

definition: Less expensive compared to something else.
example: Life here is cheaper than life in the UK.

definition: Come to a resolution in the mind as a result of consideration.
example: I can't decide where to go on holiday.

definition: A person who plans the form, look, or workings of something before its being made or built, typically by drawing it in detail.
example: She's a famous designer. She makes beautiful clothes.

definition: (Of food) recently made or obtained; not tinned, frozen, or otherwise preserved.
example: The fruit is very fresh. It's delicious.

definition: Make a polite, formal, or friendly request to (someone) to go somewhere or to do something.
example: Did he invite you to the party?

definition: Feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of.
example: I will miss you when you go home.

definition: An area of countryside, or occasionally sea or fresh water, protected by the state for the enjoyment of the general public or the preservation of wildlife.
example: We went to a National Park. It was very peaceful.

definition: Present or proffer (something) for someone to accept or reject as desired.
example: Did she offer you a job?

definition: Harvest (fruit, flowers, or vegetables).
example: Do you want to pick some fresh fruit at a farm?

definition: Buses, trains, and other forms of transport that are available to the public, charge set fares, and run on fixed routes.
example: Do you use public transport? ~ Yes, I get the bus.

definition: Come or go back to a place or person.
example: I return in two weeks – on the 27th.

definition: An organization for people who take part in a particular sport.
example: We play football at a sports club.

definition: A brass instrument with a flared bell and three buttons pressed to vary the notes.
example: He is learning to play the trumpet.

definition: Go to see and spend time with (someone) socially.
example: Please come on holiday here and visit me.

definition: The period from 2001 to 2100.
example: Were you born in the 21st century? ~ Yes, in 2001.

definition: Propose marriage to someone.
example: Did you ask Miriam to marry you?

definition: A flight scheduled for an early time of day.
example: We have an early flight. It leaves at 4 a.m.

definition: Take delight or pleasure in (an activity or occasion).
example: Did you enjoy your holiday? ~ Yes, it was great!

definition: A formal test of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject or skill.
example: Good luck in your exam tomorrow!

definition: The pair of globular organs in the head through which people and vertebrate animals see.
example: He has brown eyes and black hair.

definition: Become joined in marriage.
example: When did Miriam and Dominic get married?

definition: Be admitted to a hospital for treatment.
example: Did they have to go to hospital? ~ Yes, they were ill.

definition: Organize or hold a social gathering.
example: We will have a party with our friends for my birthday.

definition: Asking about someone's experiences during the day.
example: How was your day? ~ It was good, thanks.

definition: Announcing one's return.
example: Hi. I'm back! ~ Hello. How was your day?

definition: An act of surgery performed on a patient.
example: She has to have an operation in hospital.

definition: Attractive in a delicate way without being truly beautiful.
example: It's a small and pretty town.

definition: Cut the hair off one's face or another part of one's body with a razor.
example: You can shave or you can grow a beard.

definition: A person who serves in an army.
example: We saw a picture of a Roman soldier.

definition: A day that is significant or memorable for a particular reason.
example: It's a special day. It's our son's birthday.

definition: Music written in a Western musical tradition, typically using an established form (e.g. a symphony).
example: Do you like classical music? ~ I like Mozart and Beethoven.

definition: A large public building designed for the performance of concerts.
example: The concert is in the concert hall. There are 800 seats.

definition: Give something and receive something of the same kind in return.
example: Let's exchange phone numbers. Here's my number.

definition: Containing or holding as much or as many as possible; having no empty space.
example: The hall is full. There are no empty seats.

definition: A verbal, written, or recorded communication sent to or left for a recipient who cannot be contacted directly.
example: Did you get my message? What do you think?

definition: A pleasant odour.
example: That's a nice smell. ~ Yes, it smells like flowers.

definition: A raised level surface on which people or things can stand, especially at a railway station.
example: The train leaves from platform 3.

definition: A thing made or used for sitting on, such as a chair or stool.
example: This is your seat – 21A.

definition: Expressing that something has caught one's attention or curiosity.
example: I can speak six languages. ~ That's interesting.

definition: Passes that allow admission to a musical performance.
example: I have tickets for a concert. Do you want to come?

definition: Indicating that it is the appropriate moment to depart.
example: Time to go. We have to leave now.

definition: Activate a source of illumination.
example: Can you turn on a light? It's dark.
